creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: standing woman in green kimono; clutching skirts in PL hand; clutching folds over chest with PR hand; red undergarments showing at front of skirt and bust; pine-like pattern on kimono at bottom; whitish obi with blue design; elaborate coif; toes of PL toes just peeking out from under skirts; top and bottom lips differ in color
markings: URC, red intaglio artist seals: 乗良 {Jōryō}, 眞眞 {Shinshin}
title: Woman in Green Kimono
